string.text: The Saiga-23 was developed by mechanics of the zone for stalkers hunting the toughest of mutants. Inspired by the russian prototype KS-23K, this gun wasbased off the Saiga-12 and built as a bullpup for greater mobility. The weapon was then rechambered to fire 23x75mm shotgun shells and refitted with a 510mm KS-23 barrel. The result is an extremely deadly close range weapon.
